training_program.name: Soccer Conditioning and Skills
training_program.description: This program focuses on conditioning and skill development for soccer players.

training_sets.name: Interval Running
training_sets.description: Perform interval running to improve cardiovascular endurance.

training_sets.name: Dribbling Drills
training_sets.description: Practice dribbling drills to improve ball control and footwork.

training_sets.name: Passing Accuracy
training_sets.description: Focus on passing accuracy and technique with passing drills.

training_set.name: Warm-up Routine
training_set.description: Start with a dynamic warm-up routine to prepare the body for training.
